predicate.note: Frames file for 'juxtapose' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Either way it was a pity , because Mr. Stolzman offered the most substantial music of the evening [*ICH*-1] just after intermission : Steve Reich 's `` New York Counterpoint , '' one of a series of Reich works that [*T*-21] juxtapose a live performer with recorded tracks of his or her own playing .
example.arg: recorded tracks of his or her own playing
